message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand your perspective, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $13500. I'm willing to compromise and sell the product to you for $13800. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $13800. Would you be willing to meet me at $13500?
I understand you're still looking for a bit more flexibility, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $13700. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $13700. Would you be willing to meet me at $13600?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession and sell the product to you for $13500. This is my final offer. What do you think?
